name: (Don't) Make Me Socialize
description:
Socializing when you're an introvert is usually a struggle. You find yourself trapped in the paradox of wanting to make friends and develop relationships but being too exhausted by interactions. In this 2D visual-novel, you'll have to experience the situation of being alone at a party  because your friend has left. Maybe this is the chance to meet some new people and have fun but... will you have enough energy to do this in a satisfaying way? Will you be able to stand the overwhelming environment filled with loud music and flashing lighst and listen to the guests so you can know what to say next?

A game by Mashed Potatoes.

Original graphics by lyhdyr.

Texts are in Spanish.
